title: EV sales in India to reach 10 mn units by 2030, to create 5 mn jobs: Nitin Gadkari
description: Electric vehicle sales in India are projected to reach 10 million units by 2030, creating 5 million jobs, according to Union Minister Nitin Gadkari. The market potential is expected to touch Rs 20 lakh crore, with the EV finance market growing to Rs 4 lakh crore. Battery costs are likely to decrease, boosting affordability and adoption.
